alert.note: Alert for George; Perry; Stone (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 25 at 1:47PM CDT until August 25 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A RED FLAG WARNING IS IN EFFECT THIS AFTERNOON AND SATURDAY AFTERNOON DUE TO HIGH KDBI INDICES AND DRY FUELS... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR STONE, GEORGE, AND PERRY COUNTIES IN SOUTHEAST MISSISSIPPI... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 8 PM CDT SATURDAY FOR INLAND SOUTHEAST MISSISSIPPI... The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from 10 AM to 8 PM CDT Saturday. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zones 075, 078 and 079. * WINDS...West 5 to 10 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 29 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
